attributes.title: It’s a no from me
attributes.review: HUUUUGEEE failure. DISGUSTING. I opened this app hoping to find a strong leader, unfortunately, I saw an 🍊orange🍊. I assume he got lost on his way to the grocery store. Anyways, would not recommend to a friend. God save the queen😌✌🏻

attributes.title: Awful
attributes.review: Terrible platform, made my phone glitch out, very confusing format and accidentally made me racist

attributes.title: Useless
attributes.review: I opened the app expecting to find some super exclusive content like Trump’s OnlyFans but it was just like stupid texts asking for money 😤 I’m very disappointed and disgusted

attributes.title: ~scary~
attributes.review:
I could not believe I had to enter my phone number the second I opened the app! What you want my phone number to share with third parties?! ABSOLUTELY DISGUSTING
#horrified

attributes.title: Literally screw this
attributes.review: This is the worst app on the App Store. I don’t know why it even exists. Trump shouldn’t have any right to put that sort of content on the App Store. Screw Donald Trump. #trumpforprison

attributes.title: Cheeto Hitler
attributes.review: I downloaded this app as a way to support Cheeto Hitler but as soon as I downloaded it, I was reminded that literally anyone would be better suited to run our country. My mistake.

attributes.title: nasty
attributes.review: this app made my phone smell SO bad 🤢🤢 I litterally don’t understand how, it was nasty. and I started getting spam nasty text messages saying “trump 2020” 🤢🤢🤢 I do not recommend, it smelled so bad my cat died🙈🙈🙈

attributes.title: HORRIBLE.
attributes.review: I’ve never had such a horriable app in fact I think I might switch over to Samsung just because of this app. Horrible.

attributes.title: So horrible!!!
attributes.review: I got this app so I could worship our savior 🌟✨orange✨🌟 THEN this person piped up and started BASHING me he said “vote for trump” like EW! THEN it told me to DIE and to go to a ODD location,✨🧚‍♂️so I did🧚‍♂️✨ then got MURDERED by some “mike pence” so yeah that’s how I died. 🧚‍♂️
